EmailTemplate.description: Follow up to clients letting them know their messages are activated
EmailTemplate.name: Message Activation - Auto
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Lighthouse Messages are now active - {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Yodle_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Practice_Name__c},
Congratulations, your messages are now active with Lighthouse! We will begin sending your Maintenance Reminders, Recommended Services and Feedback Invitations today. In addition to email, Maintenance Reminders and Recommended Services are also able to be sent via postcard. We have noted what has been activated for your account. You can turn on the inactive features at any time, just give us a call. Prices referenced below may be subject to change upon advanced notice to you.
*Time-Based Maintenance Reminder Postcards ($1.00/postcard ) - {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Maintenance_Reminder_PC__c} Postcards that get mailed three and six months after the vehicle owner’s last visit notifying them that they are due for maintenance and to schedule an appointment.
*Mileage-Based Maintenance Reminder Postcards ($1.00/postcard ) - {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Maintenance_Reminder_PC_mileage__c} Postcards that get mailed a month after we see a vehicle is within 2,000 miles of 30,000/60,000/90,000 miles in your SMS notifying them that they are due for maintenance and to schedule an appointment.
*Recommended Services Postcards ($1.00/postcard) - {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Recommended_Services_PC__c} Postcards that get mailed one and two months after you have recommended a service asking them to schedule an appointment.
If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at autosupport@lighthousepmg.com or call 855-855-8728.
Thank you for choosing Lighthouse. We appreciate your business!
Lighthouse Support (855) 855-8728 autosupport@lighthousepmg.com
